column1: Funeral services will be 1:00 pm Saturday
column3: 2015 at Wallace & Wallace Funeral Home in Arbovale
column4: with Pastor Julian Rittenhouse officiating assisted by Pastor Gerold Senger
column5: Jr. Interment will follow in the Arbovale Cemetery.  Visitation will be from 12:00 noon until time of the service at the funeral home on Saturday.
